name: Hide N Seek VR
description: Fall back into childhood with this addictive VR adaptation of the beloved hide and seek. Try to find the other players in surprising environments to get the best score. Lie down under beds or crouch behind crates and try to secure the best hiding spot!
minimum_requirements: OS: Window 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 (equivalent or better) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480 (equivalent or better) Storage: 2 GB available space
